inclusion.criterion: being scheduled for myringoplasty/tympanoplasty with removal of a patent tube or for repair of existing eardrum perforation remaining after a tube
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: less than or equal to 8 weeks prior to surgery
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: syndromic or with craniofacial malformation (eg, Down syndrome, cleft palate)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: parent anticipates being unable to keep appointments (e.g., moving out of area)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man with Parkinson's disease. He has mild symptoms and no signs of dementia.
